rukus.text: Is someone whom We promised him a good promise and he meets it, the same as someone whom We made him enjoy the enjoyments of this worldâ€™s life, then on the resurrection day he is among the summoned ones
On a day that He calls them out and He says: where are My partners, the ones you were claiming

Those against whom the word (of punishment) is justified, say: our Master, these are the ones whom we misled, we misled them as we were misled, we clear ourselves (from them) before You, they were not serving us
And it is said: call on your partners (of God). So they call them, but they do answer them and they see the punishment, (and they wish) if only they were guided
And on a day that He calls them out, then He says: what did you answer the messengers
On that day the information is unclear to them, so they do not (even) ask each other
As for anyone who repented and believed and did good work, perhaps he will be of the successful ones
And your Master creates what He wants and He chooses (what He wants). There is no choice for them. God is flawless and is above what they associate (with Him)
And your Master knows what their chests hide and what they disclose

And He is God, there is no god except Him, all praise in the first (this life) and the last (the hereafter) belongs to Him, and the command (and making rules) belongs to Him, and you are returned to Him
Say: what do you think if God makes the night continuous over you until the resurrection day, what god other than God brings you light? Do you not listen
Say: what do you think if God makes the day continuous over you until the resurrection day, what god other than God brings you night to rest in it? Do you not see
And He made the night and the day for you by His mercy in order for you to rest in it and to pursue His bounty, and you may be thankful
On a day when He calls them out, then He says: where are My partners, those whom you were claiming
And We pull out a witness from every group, then We say: bring your proof. Then they will know that the truth belongs to God, and what they used to make up abandoned them
